```{r}

#"+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 +no_defs +ellps=WGS84 +towgs84=0,0,0"

library(tidyverse)
library(rgdal)
library(sf)
library(sp)
library(igraph)



nodes <- st_read("~/lion_projected nodes/","LION_projected_nodes") %>% 
  st_transform(nodes, crs = "+proj=longlat") 
slow_zones <- st_read("~/VZV_Neighborhood Slow Zones/","slow_zones") %>% 
  st_transform(nodes, crs = "+proj=longlat")


nodes <- nodes %>% mutate(in_slow_zone = lengths(st_within(nodes, slow_zones))) 


write.csv(nodes, file = "node_slow_zone_indicators.csv")

```
